definition: to comfort/to console/to stroke/to caress/an old term for province or provincial governor

sentences.english: Softly, deftly, music shall caress you…
sentences.chinese: 溫柔地，輕靈地，樂聲將把你撫慰。

sentences.english: The parents after parting company for placatory I, give me more love respectively.
sentences.chinese: 分手後的父母爲了撫慰我，分別給予我更多的愛。

sentences.english: Standing all by myself, body and shadow comforting each other.
sentences.chinese: 冷暖自知，與本人的影子相互撫慰。

sentences.english: And that we actively comfort ourselves.
I want to sooth your upset soul with my soft and sweet whispers.
sentences.chinese: 想用我輕柔溫情的呢喃，撫慰你驛動不安的心靈。

sentences.english: Soothe your soul and your hair with calming techniques.
sentences.chinese: 心平氣和的撫慰你的靈魂和頭髮。

sentences.english: They know that a hug and a kiss can heal a broken heart.
sentences.chinese: 她們知道一個擁抱和一個親吻能撫慰破碎的心。

sentences.english: The mind needs to comfort, smooths all distortions and sad happy.
sentences.chinese: 心靈更需要撫慰，撫平所有扭曲和悲喜。

sentences.english: Another bath midnight, alternating hot and cold water soothe the chest.
sentences.chinese: 另外洗澡的時分，用冷熱水交替撫慰胸部。

sentences.english: Thereupon the young man laughed and caressed the wench.
sentences.chinese: 年輕人在那裏笑着，撫慰着那個女人。

sentences.english: Within the head, and comforts me with never-ceasing care.
sentences.chinese: 用永不停息的關懷來撫慰着我。

sentences.english: The picture has aroused all the tender feelings in me and softened the grimness that is all around.
sentences.chinese: 照片激起我心中的萬般柔情，撫慰這周遭一切的冷酷。
奶奶親切地撫慰愛麗絲。

sentences.english: Comforts your post to move the restless mind.
sentences.chinese: 撫慰你驛動不安的心靈。
這種能撫慰你心靈的食物又是什麼？

sentences.english: Especially i felt this when i made any attempt to propitiate him .
sentences.chinese: 我想撫慰他時尤其感到這點，我的同情得不到呼應。

definition: to recount/to tell of/to relate/(fig.) (of a thing) to stand as testament to (some past history)
to gently caress and stroke/to pet/to fondle
to touch/to stir up (trouble or emotions)/to move (sb's emotions or worry)
to worry about/to be concerned about
